text: “Mosesɨn kamra Israelia an aghuagha ghaze, ‘Tina nɨ amɨsevezɨ nɨ en gumazir dapanim ko jasɨn ikiava en gari?’ Ezɨ kar anarɨra, gumazir God uabɨ men gumazir dapanimɨn ikɨ, ua me iniasava amadazim. E fo, God Moses bagha enselɨn mam amadazɨ ensel temer isimɨn aven otozɨ Moses an gara God amadazir akam ini.
